name: Masked Monster
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME HAS DISTURBING CONTENT 

Avoid Traps and A monster for as long as you can using spare parts (the 2 mechanics) from a AI this monster dismantled.

Some Sprites used from Kenney's 1 bit art pack

Music from A Nightmare on Elm Street for the NES 

Submitted For Wowie Jam 4
